message:
An innovative healthcare technology Company is hiring a qualified caliber :

Front End:

Job Requirements: 

• Expert with hand-coding advanced HTML5, CSS3, JS/AJAX techniques.
• Knowledge of CSS frameworks (i.e. Twitter Bootstrap)
• Familiar with CSS preprocessing frameworks.
• Familiar with Visual Studio 2012.
• Keep up to date with the latest tools, techniques and best practices and help introduce new ideas to the team

• JavaScript and UI programming using client-side libraries like jQuery, and KnockoutJs is a plus

Job Description:

• Collaborates with team to create HTML5 page layouts, professional visual appearance, CSS creation and resolve cross browser compatibility issues.
• Creates and contributes to a rich library of robust, reusable components and tools to streamline future development

To Apply Send Your CV at : Christina.saber@drbridge.com
